name: SunPumpTrading
description: SunPumpTradingTool is the first professional telegram trading bot built on Tron, which was created by Ax, who has made 6000x profit on sundog Our standout features include: Cost efficiency Our bot provides the function of replenishing energy, which will let you can save up 30%- 70% of the gas fee, and we are the only bot can do that for now. Real-Time Market monitoring Keep tabs on new coin creatings on SunPump with real-time monitoring, allowing you to capture emerging market opportunities. Lightning-fast transactions Experience ultra-fast transaction processing, enhancing both speed and efficiency, saving you valuable time Limit orders (Coming Soon) Limit orders can effectively control transaction prices, and combined with stop-loss orders can reduce investors' losses, you can set your buying and selling price as you wish. Auto-Snipe (Coming Soon) Our bot enables users to snipe any token instantly once they were added on Sunpump To use our bot you will pay trading fees (this is common across all bots). Our fees are: Manual buys and limit orders = 1% Autosniper = 1% Trades = 1%
